Translations.Text: Is. Atnan issekniyen n Leqwoan, akked Tezmamt ipbegginen
D nnhaya u d abecceo i lmumnin
wid ibedden i teallit, ippaken zzakat, ipputebbten $ef laxeot nnsen
Ih, wid ur numin ara s laxeot, Ncebbee asen igiten nnsen, d$a ddebdeben
Widak, fellasen aaaqeb ucmit mavi. Di laxeot, d nitni ara ixesoen ugwar
S tidep, kecc iusa k id Leqwoan, s$uo Bab n uuwab, Amusnaw
Mi inna Musa i twacult is: "nek wala$ times, ad awen d awi$, segs, asali, ne$ ad awen d awi$ asafu ioeqqen, amar a ppesseemum
Mi ibbwev $uoes, ipwanced: "ad ioqu wayen illan di tmes, akked wayen i as d izzin. Gedha s Oebbi, Mass imavalen
A Musa! Ih, Nek d Oebbi, Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Veggeo taakwazt ik"! Mi p iwala la tesseeoiiiw, amzun d azrem, ibren, ur iwexxeo. "A Musa! Ur ppagwad! Ar $uoI, ih, ur ppagwaden imazanen
siwa win idensen, sinna, iu$al iwqem, deffir tuccva. Nek, s tidep, Psemmiee$, Peunnu
Ger afus ik di loib ik, a d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. Si tza issekniyen, i Feraun akked ugdud is. Nitni, war ccekk, d agdud icemten
Mi ten id usan issekniyen nne£, ainani, nnan: "wagi iban d sseur
Ugin ten s ddens d pnefxa, u, deg iman nnsen, pputebbten. Wali, ihi, amek tevoa d ifessaden
Ni$ Nefka tamusni i Dawed akked Sliman. Nnan: "ccekoan i Oebbi, i a$ Ismenyafen i waiau n yimdanen iumnen
Sliman iwoet Dawed, u inna: "a yimdanen! Nepwaselmed tutlayt n yifoax; ippunefk a$ si yal cci. Ayagi, s tidep, ard lfevl n uuee
Pwajemmlen d, i Sliman, i²asekoiwen is si leonun, imdanen, ifoax. Mdarraren
Armi, mi bbwven ar te$zut n twevfin, tenna d tweiuft: "a yaweiiuf, kecmemt ar ixxamen nnkwent, mulac, war ccekk, a kwent ied Sliman, neppa akked iasekoiwen is, ur faqen
Icmumee, ivua, $ef wayen d tenna. Inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi ad snemmre$ l$it iK, is i $ T$atev, nek akked imawlan iw; ad xedme$ ise$ ara Toaviv; Ssekcem iyi, s ueunu K, ar imdanen iK imaanen
Issefqed ifoax, inna: "acimi ur wala$ ara iccibib, day d l$ayeb
War ccekk, ad saaddi$ fellas aaaqeb uqsie, ne$ a t zlu$, ne$ a d iawi tasebbiwt tubrizt
Ur iaaiiel ara. Inna d: "fehme$ ayen ur tefhimev. Usi$ d $uoek si Saba, s usali unuie
Ih, ufi$ en tameiiut d tagellii nnsen. Ippunefk as si yal cci. £uoes asgeld abarar
Ufi$ p in, neppat akked ugdud is, la kennun i yiiij, war Oebbi. Cciian icebbee asen igiten nnsen. Iveof iten seg ubrid, d$a nitni ur pwanhan
Acimi ur knan ara i Oebbi, id Issufu$en lesrar, di tmurt akked igenwan, i Ieoan ayen teppeffrem u ayen d tepberrieem
Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ameqwoaean
Inna: "a neeo ma tessawlev d tidep, ne$ ma kecc seg ikeddaben
Oue s teboap iw agi, veggeo asen p, sinna, wexxeo asen, wali acu ara d rren
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, tepwaveggeo iyi d teboap tukyist
Ih, s$uo Sliman. Apan: s yisem n Oebbi Aenin Ipeunun
Ur ssem$waoet ara iman nnwen $uoi, aset ed $uoi, d imvuaen
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, fket ed ooay nnwen af lameo iw. Ur pseyyi$ lameo, siwa garawen
Nnan: "nekwni d imawlan n tezmert, nesaa lemeella tuqsiet. Lameo i kem. Muqel d acu ara d tseyyiv
Tenna: "s tidep, igeldan ssefsaden tamdint ara kecmen. Sdullun imdanen is laali. Akka ay xeddmen
Nek, ad asen azne$ tarzeft, ad aoou$ acu ara d awin imcegaan
Mi tebbwev ar Sliman, inna: "day ad iyi taawnem s terkunt? Ayen i yi Ifka Oebbi, yif ayen i wen Ifka. D kunwi kan i ifeoeen, s terzeft nnwen
U$al $uosen. Ih, a noue $uosen s laaskeo, iwumi ur zmiren. A ten id nessuffe$, syenna, ndellen, d imejiueen
Inna: "a yimvebboen, anwa degwen, ara yi d iawin asgeld is, uqbel a yi d asen d imvuaen
Aafrit si leonun, inna d: "ad ak t id awi$, uqbel ma tekkrev seg umekkan ik. I wayagi, war ccekk, nek d uzmir muman

Inna d bab n tmusni si Tezmamt: "nek ad ak t id awi$, uqbel a pfukkev asmeomec". Mi t iwala irs ed $uoes, inna: "wagi si lfevl n Mass iw, ad iyi ijeooeb ma ad snemmre$, ne$ ma ad jehle$. Win isnemmren, isnemmer kan i iman is. Win ijehl, ihi, Mass iw d Asaay, d Ukyis
Inna: "bedlet as udem usgeld is, a neeo ma tepwanha, ne$ haap seg wid ur nepwanha
Mi d tusa, nnan as: "day am wagi, usgeld inem"? Terra d: "amzun d neppa". "Tusa ya$ d tmusni, uqbel neppat, nuzen
Isoue ip wayen tunez, war Oebbi. Tella, s tidep, seg ugdud ijehliyen

Nnan as: "ekcem ar lbeoo"! Mi t twala, t$il degs aman; tesban ed ifadden is. Inna: "s tidep, d lbeoo ulelluc imzin". Tenna: "a Mass iw! Ih, dense$ iman iw. Akked Sliman, unze$ aS i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ni$ Nuzen ed, i Tamud, gmat sen Ualie: "aabdet Oebbi"! Maca, rran snat n trebbuya$, ppemnamarent
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acimi tep$awalem ar tucmip, uqbel ise$? Lemmer a ppeste$foem Oebbi, ahat aeunu fellawen
Nnan: "tkeeeesev a$, kecc akked wi iddan yidek". Inna: "lfal nnwen ar Oebbi, u kunwi d agdud ara ippuhewwlen
Llan, di temdint, tza iterrasen i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "yyaw a nemmesgal s Oebbi, ard a neevem deg iv fellas, neppa akked twacult is. Sinna, a nini i bab is: ur nelli d inagan n tmen$iwt n tawacult is. Ih, nekwni, d imawlan n tidep
Undin ticeokep, Nundi ticeokep, nitni ur faqen
Wali amek tevoa di tceokep nnsen. Nen$ed iten, nitni, akked ugdud nnsen, meooa
Atnan hudden ixxamen nnsen, ilmend n ddens nnsen. Deg wayagi, war ccekk, assekni i ugdud issnen
Nsellek wid iumnen u llan peezziben
I Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "teppeddum ar wayen n dir, u kunwi tepwalim
Ih, kunwi teppeddum ar irgazen, teb$am ten, war tilawin. Ih, kunwi d agdud ur nessin
Tiririt n ugdud is, siwa mi d nnan: "ssuff$et tawacult n Lui, si temdint nnwen, nitni d imdanen i ib$an tezdeg
Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, siwa tameiiut is. Nseyya a ppili seg wid igwran
Nesse$li d fellasen ageffur. I icmet ugeffur n wid ippunedoen
Ini: "ccekoan i Oebbi. Talwit i imdanen iS, wid Ifren". Ppif Oebbi, ne$ ayen pcaraken

Day Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, i wen d Isse$lin aman, seg igenni - Nessenkar, yissen, iqwioen ippembehwaoen, ur teewaoem a d tessem$im ttjuo is -, day illa oebbi, ar tama n Oebbi? Maca, nitni d agdud issaadalen
Day Win Irran tamurt d tanezdu$t, Irra degs isaffen, Irra yas idurar, Irra agadir ger sin ilellen, day illa oebbi ar tama n Oebbi? Xaii, tegwti degsen, ur ssinen
Day Win Issemeasen i umevouo, mara S d isiwel; Itekksen ayen n dir; i kwen Ipparan d igensas di tmurt; day illa oebbi, ar tama n Oebbi? Drus id tesmektayem
Day Win i kwen Inehhun, di tillas n lberr akked yill, id Ippaznen avu, d abecceo n ccira ueunu S; day illa oebbi, ar tama n Oebbi? Ay Aalay Oebbi, sennig wayen pcaraken
Day Win Ibeddun lxelq, sinna, Ippales as; ikwen I$aten seg igenni akked tmurt; day illa oebbi ar tama n Oebbi? Ini: "awit ed atebbet nnwen, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "tabavnit, di tmurt akked igenwan, ur p issin yiwen siwa Oebbi. Ur eoin melmi ara d kkren
Ih, tamusni nnsen ur tessawev ar laxeot? Xaii, nitni di ccekk fellas. Xaii, nitni, fellas, dre$len
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ma nu$al d akal, am imezwura nne$, s tidep, fella$ tanekra
Ni$ waaaden a$ aya, i nekwni akw i imezwura nne$, zik. Ayagi, d timucuha kan imenza
Ini: "iniget di tmurt, walit amek tevoa d ibe$wviyen
Ur $webben fellasen, ur pxiqqi ilmend n nncub nnsen
Nnan: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma d tidep ay tessawalem
Ini: "kra n wayen i$ef tearem, ahat atan ivfeo kwen id
Mass ik, s tidep, meqqweo lfevl iS, $ef imdanen. Maca, tegwti degsen ur snemmiren
Mass ik, s tidep, Ieoa ayen teffren idmaren nnsen, akked wayen d qqaoen
Ur illi wayen iffren, deg igenni akked tmurt, ur nuri di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ih, Leqwoan agi ieekku d i At Isoail, tegwti n wayen i$ef mgarraden
Neppa, war ccekk, ard nnhaya akked ueunu i lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, ad Iseyyi garasen s ueuddu S. Neppa d Uzmir, d Amusnaw
Ppkel $ef Oebbi, ih, aql ak di tidep ipbegginen
Ih, kecc, ur tepparav lmeggtin ad slen, ur tepparav iaeeeugen ad slen i wancad, ma wexxoen
Ur fellak nnhaya ider$alen, mgal ttelfan nnsen. Ara islen, siwa wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£. Nitni d imvuaen
Mi iuao wawal fellasen, ad asen d Nessuffe$ lweec si tmurt; ad asen yini ar imdanen ur metbutit $ef issekniyen nne£
Ass ideg ara d Nefser, si yal lois, arbaa n wid inekoen issekniyen nne£, d tirni
alamma, mi d usan, ad Yini: "day tnekoem issekniyen iW, ur ten teskecmem di tmusni? Ne$ d acu tellam txeddmem
Iuao wawal fellasen, imi densen. Ur d pmeslayen
Day ur walan ara ar Nerra yasen iv i ureyyee nnsen, ass iwakken ad walin? Deg wayagi, s tidep, issekniyen i ugdud iumnen
Ass uuuvu n lbuq, ad iagwad i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, siwa wid i S ihwan i Oebbi. A d asen akw $uoeS, s ueiwet
A pwaliv idurar i t$ilev sebken, la teddun am usigna. D igi n Oebbi i Iuegmen yal cci. Neppa, s tidep, Ieoa d acu txedmem
Win id iusan s ise$, ad iawi it yifen. Widak, assen, mevmunit si tugdi
Wid id iusan s tucmip, ad ppin wudmawen nnsen ar tmes. Ni$ a ppeppuqeiiim kan $ef wayen txeddmem
Pwamoe$ kan ad aabde$ Mass n temdint agi, i Ioqa. IneS yal cci. Pwamoe$ d ad ili$ seg imduaen
ad male$ Leqwoan. Win ipwanhan, ipwanha kan i iman is. Win innetlafen, ini: "nek d aneddao kan
Ini: "a neckeo Oebbi. Ad awen Issken issekniyen iS. A ten taaqlem". Mass ik ur I$effel ara $ef wayen txeddmem
